column1: #text=Riding my bike through the park , I was enjoying the beautiful spring scenery .
#text=A family of squirrels caught my attention and I was looking at them when I hit some broken glass .
#text=I walked it back to my car , loaded up , and headed for a local department store .
#text=Sure enough , they had bike tire repair kits in the sporting goods section .
#text=I bought one , and then headed on home .
#text=Once there I removed a wheel from the bike .
#text=From it I took out the inner tube .
#text=I rubbed some soapy water on it and quickly found the problem spot .
#text=From my new repair kit I found a special patch .
#text=I applied the sealant and then stuck the patch on .
#text=I used a hair dryer to heat and set it .
#text=Next , I took out the air compressor and reinflated the inner tube .
#text=After reassembling everything , I sat on the bike and tested it out .
